replies.msg:
唔捨得㗎
但為咗佢哋好
我始終都要送佢哋走

我同自己講
多的奴才照顧佢地
分擔我嘅責任
其實對我孫孫們嘅生活質素先更有保證

依家班寶貝B都開始食濕糧
單計噚日 七個主子
我開咗11個罐罐 加三次羊奶浸BB糧
分咗五六次餵


我想講嘅唔係錢嘅方面
而係時間

我噚日攞咗假
所以先有時間分五六餐餵
照顧好佢地每一個

如果我返工嘅話

最多係早晚罐罐
其他時段就唯有長放乾乾
生活質素直綫下降

所以就算幾唔捨得
我都會為咗佢哋好
而送佢地比我信得過嘅
親朋一齊照顧

When Can Cats Become Pregnant Again?
Female cats are induced ovulators, which means that ovulation does not take place without mating or manual stimulation.1 If the female cat does not mate during estrus, hormonal levels will eventually drop off, and the estrus cycle will cease until it repeats itself in another two to three weeks. If she does mate, she can easily become pregnant during her first post-birth estrus cycle.

Ovulation will usually occur within 20 to 50 hours after mating, and the eggs are viable (capable of being fertilized) for approximately one day. The eggs are fertilized in the oviduct, and then make their way to the uterus via the uterine horn, implanting in the uterine lining within 10 to 12 days.
